data.message: Pardon me, Facebook, but would you be so kind and take a look at the ads you first approve and then shortly after disapprove ? https://www.facebook.com/232090696924656/posts/727549877378733?ppost_landing_redirect=1&placement=adalert_notif&act=102780819895085&notif_t=adalert_adgroup_disapproved

replies.message: Hi there, Leagan! If you're not sure why your ad was disapproved, you can get more information by locating the specific ad in your Ads Manager. Our Help Center has details on editing an ad to meet advertising policies or you can submit an appeal: https://www.facebook.com/business/help/215855188432216. -Kelsey

With all due respect , but i have edited, re-edited, went to the help center and from the way you are responding, it is apparent you have not personally looked at the link i supplied, either,to evaluate for yourself that this is very obviously NOT adult content. Take a close look at how many people experienced the same thing as i have and have also not received an answer. https://www.google.com/#q=facebook+ads+disapproved
